title: Can't Get Into League "We have restored the installation to a earlier version..."
body: When I open League of Legends I get a message that says "We have restored the installation to a earlier version of League of Legends. now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." and a button to press "Okay" After i hit "Okay" it says "There was a problem patching League of legends..." and there is a button to "Restart" I click it and I get the same messages over and over again. I don't know what to do please assist me. Thank you.

replies.body: We should be in the clear of any of these remaining patcher loop issues, but hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still getting caught in this loop!
